snippet: Students at Stuyvesant High School in Lower Manhattan expressed their objection to new rules by breaking them, wearing tank tops and spaghetti-strap blouses and pants and skirts shorter than allowed.
abstract: Students at Stuyvesant High School in Lower Manhattan, discontent with the school's dress code, wear prohibited clothing, like tank tops and mini-skirts, in an organized protest.
lead_paragraph: Students at Stuyvesant High School in Lower Manhattan expressed their objection to new rules by breaking them, wearing tank tops and spaghetti-strap blouses and pants and skirts shorter than allowed.

headline.seo: Stuyvesant High School Students Protest Dress Code
headline.main: Baring Shoulders and Knees, Students Protest a Dress Code
headline.print_headline: Baring Shoulders and Knees, Students Protest a Dress Code
